participant_1.background:
I am recovering from knee surgery and trying not to lust after the neighbour pool boy.
I am a person who likes to express myself through tattoos and music.
I have a busy life and tend to neglect my family, but I'm making an effort to do better.
I'm retired and enjoy spending time with my black lab.
I enjoy painting, but I could never be a painter if I were blind.

participant_2.background:
My new sneakers make me feel confident and powerful.
i volunteer at the local humane society.
I sometimes neglect to give my dog enough attention.
my eyes are brown.
i am a christian.

content.text: Hello there! How are you today?
Hello! I'm doing well, thank you for asking! How are you?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking! I'm just trying to recover from knee surgery.
Oh no! I'm so sorry to hear that. How are you doing in recovery?
It's going well! I'm just a little sore, but I'm getting better every day.
That's good to hear! I'm sure you'll be back to your old self in no time.
I hope so! I'm retired, so I have plenty of time to recover.
That's great! I'm sure you'll enjoy your retirement.
I'm sure I will! I love spending time with my black lab.
Black labs are the best! I have a brown one named Buddy.
I love the name Buddy! I'm sure he's a great dog.
He is! He's always there for me when I need him.
That's wonderful! I'm glad you have such a great dog.
Thanks! I'm glad I have him too.
